Text: [WARNING]. This 4.1.1 update of VMware.Fusion forbids back the virtualization of Mac OS Snow Leopard CLIENT guest on Mac OS Lion host, which was exceptionally allowed by previous version VMware.Fusion 4.1.0. That, in re-establishing the checking of SERVER version as condition sine qua non to virtualizing Snow Leopard - OS enabling (thanks to emulation layer Rosetta) to run PPC apps no longer supported by Lion.
It doesn't work on OS X Mountain Lion T_T
Okay... explain it to me like I'm 4... how do I use this?
